maintainers.name: David Bruce
maintainers.bio: I first picked up programming in 2010, where it has since been my outlet for creativity and enthusiasm. I cannot list all the exciting reasons why Haxe has become my language of choice in this short bio, but I hope you enjoy learning it as much as I have.

maintainers.name: Mohammad Foda
maintainers.bio: I enjoy learning new languages and am finding haxe to be uniquely productive, powerful, and fun. I hope that this exercism track serves as the tutorial and language introduction that haxe deserves.
